Thanks for these! Last High Def Batman torrent I got was also an MP4, but the video played super choppy in VLC and the video wouldn't show up at all on the PS3, just audio. Re-encoding the MP4 fixed that, but then I found the audio out of sync throughout. 

I was a little worried here at first, I downloaded Batman Returns (since I've already got Batman in High Def) and its played pretty choppy in VLC. But it plays PERFECT on the PS3, and that's what counts for me! Thanks!

To all downloaders, avoid the "YIFY" uploads of the Batman films (and presumably Yify's other uploads), they play choppy on the computer and video won't play at all on the PS3.
